message: Let's be reasonable, Bob.  Take this generous offer and we can both walk away happy.
That's not how this works, Alice.  I'm feeling generous, so I'll give you a chance to accept a fair deal.
Okay, Bob, let's be serious. This is a fair offer considering the inflation, and we both lose if this drags on.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere.  Meet me in the middle or this money will be worthless soon.
Bob, time is running out! This is more than fair considering the money is losing value for you every round.
Alice, the clock is ticking!  I'm offering you a deal you can't refuse if you're serious about getting any real value out of this.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering you a deal you'd have jumped at a few rounds ago. Don't be foolish, accept and let's end this.
